{"id":1202274042,"question_id":2571,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"3Â months","timestamp":1710311970,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"2 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1202274042/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find the Pivot Integer","memory":"41.9 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int pivotInteger(int n) {\n        \n\n        int[] presum = new int[n];\n        int[] sufsum = new int[n];\n\n        for(int i=0; i<n ;i++){\n            presum[i] = i==0 ? 1 : presum[i-1]+i+1;\n        }\n\n        for(int i=n-1; i>=0; i--){\n            sufsum[i] = i==n-1 ? n : sufsum[i+1] + i+1;\n        }\n\n        for(int i=0; i<n; i++){\n            if(presum[i]==sufsum[i])\n                return i+1;\n        }\n\n        return -1;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-the-pivot-integer","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
